infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FairTradeWorker needs access to your camera to take photos of your project for job scoping.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: FairTradeWorker needs access to your microphone to record voice notes describing your project.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FairTradeWorker needs access to your photo library to upload project photos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow FairTradeWorker to access your camera for project photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow FairTradeWorker to access your photos for project uploads.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow FairTradeWorker to access your microphone for voice notes.
